attributes.action: Reopen cottage hospitals shut by the Gov to treat  victims of coronavirus.

rejection.details:
Decisions about opening new hospitals are made by individual NHS Trusts, not the Government or Parliament.

You could start a petition calling on the Government to make funding available for new hospitals, to respond to the demands of the coronavirus outbreak.

We have published a petition calling on the Government to commit to requisitioning private hospital beds amid the COVID-19 pandemic, which you might like to sign: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302610


You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
